hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Water Temple Compass Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Dampé's Hut#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #the Market#.

ZF (Fairy).text: It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions:^How did Medigoron get inside that hole, and how does he get out for the credits?
